frc.robot.subsystems

Class DriveBase

  • java.lang.Object
    • Subsystem
      • frc.robot.subsystems.DriveBase

  • public class DriveBase
extends Subsystem
    This subsystem defines the drivebase of the robot

    The drivebase is holonomic, with four mechanum wheels

    Each wheel is powered by one motor, connected to a TalonSRX

      • initDefaultCommand

        public void initDefaultCommand()
        Sets the default command, to run if no other command requires the DriveBase

      • periodic

        public void periodic()
        Called when the run method of the Scheduler is called

      • move

        public void move(Joystick joystick,
                 boolean withHeadingPID,
                 boolean headless)
        Moves robot using joystick
        Parameters:
        joystick - joystick used to control robot
        withHeadingPID - if true, IMU input will be used to correct heading
        headless - if true, will interpret directions as relative to field

      • move

        public void move(double speed,
                 double direction,
                 double rotation,
                 boolean withHeadingPID,
                 boolean headless)
        Moves robot using movement values with IMU input
        Parameters:
        speed - target speed
        direction - target direction
        rotation - target rotation speed
        withHeadingPID - if true, will use IMU input to correct heading
        headless - if true, will interpret directions as relative to field

      • moveWithoutIMU

        public void moveWithoutIMU(double speed,
                           double direction,
                           double rotation)
        Moves robot using movement values without IMU input
        Parameters:
        speed - target speed
        direction - target direction
        rotation - target rotation speed

      • rawMove

        public void rawMove(double LF,
                    double LR,
                    double RF,
                    double RR)
        Moves robot using raw motor values
        Parameters:
        LF - power to left front wheel
        LR - power to left rear wheel
        RF - power to right front wheel
        RR - power to right rear wheel

      • setHeading

        public void setHeading(double heading)
        Sets the imu's current heading, as well as the target heading
        Parameters:
        heading - the heading to be set

      • getHeading

        public double getHeading()
        Accesses the imu heading
        Returns:
